mapper.insert:
select sys_guid() as id from DUAL
insert into T_CPIC_CODE_TYPE(ID,TYPE,CODE,CONTENT,REMARK,FST,LMT,FOID,LOID) values(#{id},#{type},#{code},#{content},#{remark},#{fst},#{lmt},#{foid},#{loid})
mapper.select: select t.ID as id, t.TYPE as type, t.CODE as code, t.CONTENT as content, t.REMARK as remark, t.FST as fst, t.LMT as lmt, t.FOID as foid, t.LOID as loid from T_CPIC_CODE_TYPE t where t.ID = #{id}
